titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Winfred Bauer was an avid birdwatcher who lived in the Philadelphia area. He was a member of the Penn Warren Club and might have been a member of the Delaware Valley Ornithological Club.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of the birdwatching records kept by Winfred Bauer for over sixty years. Included are index cards (1933-1996), field notebooks (1939-1994), and yearly and species tabulations describing birds Bauer observed in Philadelphia, Bucks County, and Florida. The collection also includes a card file index of birds of the world.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: David Long, Bucks County Audubon Society
